resources.string: Select the option on the Top App Bar and you can choose what style of map do you want
Select the option on the Top App Bar and you will choose what type of map do you want
Zoom in or zoom out to show building in 3D
Zoom in or zoom out and you will get a limitation of zoom in or zoom out
Wait a second, the maps will be update position
Scroll on the map and you will find the scroll has been restricted
Click on the map and you will get a notice and a long click you will get a Lat/Lng
Click on the marker and you will information about the marker
Wait a second, the map will be updated with a smooth transition
Click and drag on the marker and you can move the marker wherever you want
The color of marker has been changed
Click on the marker you will find information about the marker
Click on the marker you will find custom information about the marker
Wait a second, Polyline will be drawn on the map
If the App has been granted to access the location, you will find “My Location Button” on the top. Click “My Location Button” and the maps will show your current location.
Click this button below to show the list of subject
